data.name: Them Apples
data.text: Give minions in the Tavern +1/+3.

data.name: Tavern Coin
data.text: Gain 1 Gold.

data.name: Pointy Arrow
data.text: Give a minion +4 Attack.

data.name: Fortify
data.text: Give a minion +3 Health and Taunt.

data.name: Tavern Dish Banana
data.text: Give a minion +2/+2.

data.name: Recruit a Trainee
data.text: Get a random Tier 1 minion.

data.name: Enchanted Lasso
data.text: Steal a random minion from Bob's Tavern.

data.name: Careful Investment
data.text: Gain 2 Gold next turn.

data.name: Lantern Light
data.text: Give a minion stats equal to your Tier.

data.name: Chef's Choice
data.text: Choose a minion. Get a different minion of the same type.

data.name: Shiny Ring
data.text: Give your minions +1/+1.

data.name: Strike Oil
data.text: Increase your maximum Gold by 1.

data.name: Hasty Excavation
data.text: Gain 1 Gold. This costs Health to buy instead of Gold.

data.name: Overconfidence
data.text: If you win your next combat, gain 3 Gold. If you tie, gain 1.

data.name: Tricky Trousers
data.text: Give a minion +1/+2 and Taunt. If it already has Taunt, remove it.

data.name: Fleeting Vigor
data.text: Give a minion +7/+7 until next turn.

data.name: Staff of Enrichment
data.text: Minions in the Tavern have +1/+2 this game.

data.name: Echoing Roar
data.text: Give a friendly minion "At the end of your turn, gain +2/+2."

data.name: Natural Blessing
data.text: Choose a minion. Give all minions that share a type with it +2/+2.

data.name: Suspicious Stimulant
data.text: Choose a minion in the Tavern. Lock it in your hand for one turn and double its stats.

data.name: Planar Telescope
data.text: Discover a minion of your most common type.

data.name: Gem Confiscation
data.text: Play 2 Blood Gems on a friendly minion. It steals all Blood Gems from its neighbors.

data.name: Ritual of Growth
data.text: Replace all cards in the Tavern with ones of a Tier higher.

data.name: Toxic Tumbleweed
data.text: Start of Combat: Summon a 1/1 Tumbling Assassin with Venomous. It attacks immediately.

data.name: Boon of Beetles
data.text: Start of Combat: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Beetle."

data.name: Butchering
data.text: Destroy a friendly Undead. Your Undead have extra Attack equal to its Tier this game.

data.name: Spitescale Special
data.text: Get 3 random Spellcraft spells.

data.name: Brann's Blessing
data.text: Your Battlecries trigger twice until next turn.

data.name: Misplaced Tea Set
data.text: Give a friendly minion of each type +3/+3.

data.name: Hired Headhunter
data.text: Discover a Battlecry minion.

data.name: Contracted Corpse
data.text: Discover a Deathrattle minion.

data.name: Defender's Rites
data.text: Give a friendly minion +8/+8 and Taunt.

data.name: Dreamer's Embrace
data.text: Trigger a friendly minion's Battlecry.

data.name: Scavenge for Parts
data.text: At the end of your turn, get a random Magnetic minion. Lasts 3 turns.

data.name: Guzzle the Goop
data.text: At the end of your turn, give your Dragons +4 Attack. Lasts 3 turns.

data.name: Plunder Seeker
data.text: Steal a random card from the Tavern. Repeat for each friendly Pirate.

data.name: Fluidity
data.text: Swap a friendly non-Golden minion with a random one in the Tavern.

data.name: Primal Staff
data.text: Your end of turn effects trigger twice this turn.

data.name: Armor Stash
data.text: Set your Armor to 5.

data.name: Unmasked Identity
data.text: Discover a new Hero Power.

data.name: Upper Hand
data.text: Start of Combat: Set a random enemy minion's Health to 1.

data.name: Corrupted Cupcakes
data.text: Choose a friendly Demon. It consumes all minions in the Tavern to gain their stats.

data.name: Golden Touch
data.text: Make a random minion in the Tavern Golden.

data.name: Perfect Vision
data.text: Set a minion's stats to 20/20.

data.name: Saloon's Finest
data.text: Refresh the Tavern with Tavern spells.

data.name: Lost Staff of Hamuul
data.text: Choose a minion. Refresh the Tavern with minions of that type.

data.name: Azerite Empowerment
data.text: Give your minions +4/+4.

data.name: Channel the Devourer
data.text: Remove a minion. Give its stats to a random friendly minion.

data.name: Sacred Gift
data.text: Give a minion Divine Shield.
